description.narrative: This activity (NIAF 2: Technical Advice to Government) is a component of NIAF 2 - Nigeria Infrastructure Advisory Facility Phase 2 reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £100,876,599. This component benefits Nigeria, and works in the following sector(s): Public finance management (PFM), Transport policy and administrative management, Energy policy and administrative management, Privatisation, Environmental policy and administrative management, Urban development and management. , with the following implementing partners: Adam Smith International. The start date is 01-12-2011 and the end date is 31-12-2016.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

description.narrative: Accountability - General Public Service - Accountability - debt and aid management
Environment - Water, Natural Resource Management and Environment - Environment - policy, planning and administration
General Economic, Commercial and Labour Affairs - Economic Affairs - General Economic, Commercial and Labour Affairs - privatisation
Social Protection, Land Housing and Community Amenities - Social Affairs - Social Protection, Land Housing and Community Amenities - urban devt
Transport - Economic Affairs - Transport - policy, planning and administration
Aggregated spend of less than £500 - Financial Year 2014 Quarter 2
